Posts.Content: Good old 'gorilla mouth' as I coined it!  Through trial and error, what worked for me grapes, fresh pineapple ( hurts with ulcers but does work if you persevere ), fruit pastilles, orange barley water, tomato juice and luckily I love water so just kept drinking lots, even if only small sips. mouthwash I was prescribed  Benzydamine. whatever you can manage, keep eating and drinking Best of luck Sue
Posts.Title: Sore mouth

Posts.Content: Don't know what happened to my response! Oncology nurses recommended Udderly cream with urea available on Amazon when I was shedding skin.  On next pre assessment, Oncologist prescribed some for me. Wirks really well for me. best of luck Sue
